1#include "widget_element_i.h"
2#include <gui/elements.h>
3#include <m-array.h>

5#define WIDGET_ELEMENT_TEXT_SCROLL_BAR_OFFSET (4)
6
7typedef struct {
8 Font font;
9 Align horizontal;
10 FuriString* text;
11} TextScrollLineArray;
12
13ARRAY_DEF(TextScrollLineArray, TextScrollLineArray, M_POD_OPLIST)
14
15typedef struct {
16 TextScrollLineArray_t line_array;
17 uint8_t x;
18 uint8_t y;
19 uint8_t width;
20 uint8_t height;
21 FuriString* text;
22 uint8_t scroll_pos_total;
23 uint8_t scroll_pos_current;
24 bool text_formatted;
25} WidgetElementTextScrollModel;
26
27static bool
28 widget_element_text_scroll_process_ctrl_symbols(TextScrollLineArray* line, FuriString* text) {
29 bool processed = false;
30
31 do {
32 if(furi_string_get_char(text, 0) != '\e') break;
33 char ctrl_symbol = furi_string_get_char(text, 1);
34 if(ctrl_symbol == 'c') {
35 line->horizontal = AlignCenter;
36 } else if(ctrl_symbol == 'r') {
37 line->horizontal = AlignRight;
38 } else if(ctrl_symbol == '#') {
39 line->font = FontPrimary;
40 } else if(ctrl_symbol == '*') {
41 line->font = FontKeyboard;
42 }
43 furi_string_right(text, 2);
44 processed = true;
45 } while(false);
46
47 return processed;
48}
49
50void widget_element_text_scroll_add_line(WidgetElement* element, TextScrollLineArray* line) {
51 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = element->model;
52 TextScrollLineArray new_line;
53 new_line.font = line->font;
54 new_line.horizontal = line->horizontal;
55 new_line.text = furi_string_alloc_set(line->text);
56 TextScrollLineArray_push_back(model->line_array, new_line);
57}
58
59static void widget_element_text_scroll_fill_lines(Canvas* canvas, WidgetElement* element) {
60 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = element->model;
61 TextScrollLineArray line_tmp;
62 bool all_text_processed = false;
63 line_tmp.text = furi_string_alloc();
64 bool reached_new_line = true;
65 uint16_t total_height = 0;
66
67 while(!all_text_processed) {
68 if(reached_new_line) {
69 // Set default line properties
70 line_tmp.font = FontSecondary;
71 line_tmp.horizontal = AlignLeft;
72 furi_string_reset(line_tmp.text);
73 // Process control symbols
74 while(widget_element_text_scroll_process_ctrl_symbols(&line_tmp, model->text))
75 ;
76 }
77 // Set canvas font
78 canvas_set_font(canvas, line_tmp.font);
79 const CanvasFontParameters* params = canvas_get_font_params(canvas, line_tmp.font);
80 total_height += params->height;
81 if(total_height > model->height) {
82 model->scroll_pos_total++;
83 }
84
85 uint8_t line_width = 0;
86 uint16_t char_i = 0;
87 while(true) {
88 char next_char = furi_string_get_char(model->text, char_i++);
89 if(next_char == '\0') {
90 furi_string_push_back(line_tmp.text, '\0');
91 widget_element_text_scroll_add_line(element, &line_tmp);
92 total_height += params->leading_default - params->height;
93 all_text_processed = true;
94 break;
95 } else if(next_char == '\n') {
96 furi_string_push_back(line_tmp.text, '\0');
97 widget_element_text_scroll_add_line(element, &line_tmp);
98 furi_string_right(model->text, char_i);
99 total_height += params->leading_default - params->height;
100 reached_new_line = true;
101 break;
102 } else {
103 line_width += canvas_glyph_width(canvas, next_char);
104 if(line_width > model->width) {
105 furi_string_push_back(line_tmp.text, '\0');
106 widget_element_text_scroll_add_line(element, &line_tmp);
107 furi_string_right(model->text, char_i - 1);
108 furi_string_reset(line_tmp.text);
109 total_height += params->leading_default - params->height;
110 reached_new_line = false;
111 break;
112 } else {
113 furi_string_push_back(line_tmp.text, next_char);
114 }
115 }
116 }
117 }
118
119 furi_string_free(line_tmp.text);
120}
121
122static void widget_element_text_scroll_draw(Canvas* canvas, WidgetElement* element) {
123 furi_assert(canvas);
124 furi_assert(element);
125
126 furi_mutex_acquire(element->model_mutex, FuriWaitForever);
127
128 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = element->model;
129 if(!model->text_formatted) {
130 widget_element_text_scroll_fill_lines(canvas, element);
131 model->text_formatted = true;
132 }
133
134 uint8_t y = model->y;
135 uint8_t x = model->x;
136 uint16_t curr_line = 0;
137 if(TextScrollLineArray_size(model->line_array)) {
138 TextScrollLineArray_it_t it;
139 for(TextScrollLineArray_it(it, model->line_array); !TextScrollLineArray_end_p(it);
140 TextScrollLineArray_next(it), curr_line++) {
141 if(curr_line < model->scroll_pos_current) continue;
142 TextScrollLineArray* line = TextScrollLineArray_ref(it);
143 const CanvasFontParameters* params = canvas_get_font_params(canvas, line->font);
144 if(y + params->descender > model->y + model->height) break;
145 canvas_set_font(canvas, line->font);
146 if(line->horizontal == AlignLeft) {
147 x = model->x;
148 } else if(line->horizontal == AlignCenter) {
149 x = (model->x + model->width) / 2;
150 } else if(line->horizontal == AlignRight) {
151 x = model->x + model->width;
152 }
153 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
154 canvas, x, y, line->horizontal, AlignTop, furi_string_get_cstr(line->text));
155 y += params->leading_default;
156 }
157 // Draw scroll bar
158 if(model->scroll_pos_total > 1) {
159 elements_scrollbar_pos(
160 canvas,
161 model->x + model->width + WIDGET_ELEMENT_TEXT_SCROLL_BAR_OFFSET,
162 model->y,
163 model->height,
164 model->scroll_pos_current,
165 model->scroll_pos_total);
166 }
167 }
168
169 furi_mutex_release(element->model_mutex);
170}
171
172static bool widget_element_text_scroll_input(InputEvent* event, WidgetElement* element) {
173 furi_assert(event);
174 furi_assert(element);
175
176 furi_mutex_acquire(element->model_mutex, FuriWaitForever);
177
178 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = element->model;
179 bool consumed = false;
180
181 if((event->type == InputTypeShort) || (event->type == InputTypeRepeat)) {
182 if(event->key == InputKeyUp) {
183 if(model->scroll_pos_current > 0) {
184 model->scroll_pos_current--;
185 }
186 consumed = true;
187 } else if(event->key == InputKeyDown) {
188 if((model->scroll_pos_total > 1) &&
189 (model->scroll_pos_current < model->scroll_pos_total - 1)) {
190 model->scroll_pos_current++;
191 }
192 consumed = true;
193 }
194 }
195
196 furi_mutex_release(element->model_mutex);
197
198 return consumed;
199}
200
201static void widget_element_text_scroll_free(WidgetElement* text_scroll) {
202 furi_assert(text_scroll);
203
204 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = text_scroll->model;
205 TextScrollLineArray_it_t it;
206 for(TextScrollLineArray_it(it, model->line_array); !TextScrollLineArray_end_p(it);
207 TextScrollLineArray_next(it)) {
208 TextScrollLineArray* line = TextScrollLineArray_ref(it);
209 furi_string_free(line->text);
210 }
211 TextScrollLineArray_clear(model->line_array);
212 furi_string_free(model->text);
213 free(text_scroll->model);
214 furi_mutex_free(text_scroll->model_mutex);
215 free(text_scroll);
216}
217
218WidgetElement* widget_element_text_scroll_create(
219 uint8_t x,
220 uint8_t y,
221 uint8_t width,
222 uint8_t height,
223 const char* text) {
224 furi_assert(text);
225
226 // Allocate and init model
227 WidgetElementTextScrollModel* model = malloc(sizeof(WidgetElementTextScrollModel));
228 model->x = x;
229 model->y = y;
230 model->width = width - WIDGET_ELEMENT_TEXT_SCROLL_BAR_OFFSET;
231 model->height = height;
232 model->scroll_pos_current = 0;
233 model->scroll_pos_total = 1;
234 TextScrollLineArray_init(model->line_array);
235 model->text = furi_string_alloc_set(text);
236
237 WidgetElement* text_scroll = malloc(sizeof(WidgetElement));
238 text_scroll->parent = NULL;
239 text_scroll->draw = widget_element_text_scroll_draw;
240 text_scroll->input = widget_element_text_scroll_input;
241 text_scroll->free = widget_element_text_scroll_free;
242 text_scroll->model = model;
243 text_scroll->model_mutex = furi_mutex_alloc(FuriMutexTypeNormal);
244
245 return text_scroll;
246} //-V773
